overview.problem_statement: Users abandon task management apps due to overwhelming setup complexity, excessive features, and convoluted interfaces that require 10+ taps for basic task entry, creating friction instead of productivity.
overview.solution_approach: Ultra-minimalist task manager with zero configuration - pure simplicity focused on core task loop: add, view, complete, archive. No categories, projects, tags, or complex features.
overview.value_proposition: Get tasks out of your head and completed in the simplest possible way - no setup, no configuration, no complexity. Just tasks and completion.
overview.target_audience: Overwhelmed users who tried Todoist, Any.do, or similar apps but abandoned them due to feature complexity and setup requirements.

core_features.description: Add new task with one tap - opens keyboard immediately, no category selection or options
core_features.user_story: As a busy user, I want to capture a task thought in under 3 seconds so I don't lose the idea while context-switching

core_features.description: Simple list of tasks with clean typography, no visual clutter, categories, or metadata
core_features.user_story: As someone overwhelmed by complex interfaces, I want to see only my tasks in a clean list so I can focus on what needs to be done

core_features.description: Mark tasks complete with intuitive swipe gesture, immediate visual feedback
core_features.user_story: As a user completing tasks, I want to mark them done with a quick gesture so I get immediate satisfaction without interrupting flow

core_features.description: Completed tasks automatically move to archived state, keeping active list clean without manual management
core_features.user_story: As someone who completes many tasks, I want finished items to disappear automatically so my active list stays focused

core_features.description: All tasks stored locally, no cloud dependency for core functionality, instant app responsiveness
core_features.user_story: As a user who opens task apps frequently, I want instant access to my tasks without waiting for syncing or network issues

core_features.description: Free version limited to 20 active tasks, premium unlocks unlimited tasks
core_features.user_story: As a power user with many tasks, I want unlimited task storage while letting casual users use the app for free

user_personas.demographics: 35-45 years old, working parent, moderate tech comfort, tried multiple productivity apps
pain_points: Complex app setup takes too long
Forgot tasks while trying to categorize them
Apps have too many features she doesn't need
Abandoned Todoist after 2 weeks due to complexity
goals: Capture tasks quickly during busy moments
Simple way to track what's done
App that doesn't require learning or setup time
user_personas.usage_patterns: Quick task capture between meetings, checks list during coffee breaks, marks things complete while multitasking

user_personas.demographics: 25-35 years old, freelancer/consultant, high tech comfort, values simple tools
pain_points: Spends more time organizing tasks than doing them
Feature creep in apps he initially liked
Any.do became too complex over time
goals: Focus on doing rather than organizing
Maintain mental clarity with simple systems
user_personas.usage_patterns: Daily morning task review, captures ideas throughout day, prefers keyboard shortcuts and quick interactions

mobile_app_best_practices.guest_first_auth: App functions fully without account creation - tasks stored locally by default
mobile_app_best_practices.subscription_monetization: Premium subscription for unlimited tasks, custom themes, and cloud backup
mobile_app_best_practices.revenuecat_integration: Required for subscription management and premium feature gating
mobile_app_best_practices.ios_android_parity: Identical core functionality across platforms using React Native
mobile_app_best_practices.store_submission_ready: Clean, focused app description emphasizing simplicity over feature lists

standards_compliance.excluded_categories: Not applicable - simple productivity tool with no restricted content
standards_compliance.accessibility_compliance: Large touch targets, high contrast text, VoiceOver support for task management
standards_compliance.privacy_compliance: Local-first storage, no personal data collection, optional cloud sync with explicit consent
